para.text: The chair is appointed by the Governor.
Except as provided in §B(6)(b) of this regulation, convene and preside over the meetings of the Commission;
Call meetings of the Commission as necessary to accomplish the Commission's purpose;
Appoint the chairs of the Commission's standing and ad hoc committees;
Appoint the members of the Commission's committees; and
At meetings of the Commission, either:
Serve as the presiding officer; or
Designate the vice chair or other commissioner to preside over any Commission meeting the chair is unable to attend.

section.heading: Commissioners.
section.text: The Commission consists of 11 members, appointed by the Governor, with the advice and consent of the Senate, in accordance with Health-General Article, §19-2103, Annotated Code of Maryland.

para.text: Executive Director. The Executive Director of the Commission:
Is the chief administrative officer of the Commission;
Is appointed by the Commission with the approval of the Governor;
Serves at the pleasure of the Commission; and

Shall, under the direction of the Commission, perform any duty or function that the Commission requires, consistent with Health-General Article, §§19-2101 — 2201, Annotated Code of Maryland, and this subtitle.
The Commission may employ a staff in accordance with the State budget.
The Commission, in consultation with the Secretary, shall determine appropriate job classifications and grades for all staff.
